entry.content: The issue I had reviewing UFO 50 is not the issue you will have playing it. Presenting itself as an anthology of all 50 games developed by UFO Soft, a fictional game studio active from 1982-89, UFO 50 is all about breadth and variety. The player is presented with the entire catalog of games from […]
